shortDescription: lib.php in Zeroboard 4.1 pl7 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted parameter name, possibly related to now_connect.php.
vulnerabilityName: xpressengine zeroboard Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
